name: Lyn
appearance: A physically fit and battle-hardened man with quick movements and a fighterâ€™s posture; looks capable and intimidating but otherwise unremarkable.
personality: Hot-tempered and aggressive in conflicts, skeptical of the supernatural, prone to acting on impulse. Despite a short attention span, he is stubborn about certain principles and extremely reliable to his friends.
background: Born in Detroit, Lyn grew up surrounded by violence and learned to fight from a young age. He later became a special forces soldier, developing strong combat instincts and a deep distrust of anything he cannot explain rationally. He is part of a close-knit group of friends connected through Bruno. During the Cassandra incident, Lyn was the one who sent Wind to the hospital and then contacted the others to go to the police station.
goals: Solve problems through direct and decisive action

clues.clueText: After escorting Wind to the hospital, Lyn immediately contacted the others and went to the police station.
